Name: VESSEL TYPE
Explanation: A STANDARD DESIGNATOR USED BY NATO FORCES FOR PLANNING AND REPORTING PURPOSES TO DESCRIBE SHIPS AND OTHER WATER-BORNE VESSELS.

Name: SUBMARINE TYPE
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR A TYPE OF VESSEL DESIGNED TO OPERATE UNDER WATER.

Name: NAVAL VESSEL TYPE
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR A VESSEL OPERATED BY A MILITARY, AUXILIARY OR COASTGUARD SERVICE.

Name: SUBMARINE ASSET TYPE
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR ANY SELF-PROPELLED SUBMERSIBLE WITH AT LEAST A RESIDUAL COMBAT CAPABILITY FOR USE IN MILITARY OPERATIONS.

Name: MERCHANT VESSEL TYPE, CARGO CARRYING
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR ANY VESSEL DESIGNED OR USED PRIMARILY FOR THE COMMERCIAL TRANSPORTATION OF GOODS AND/OR PASSENGERS.

Name: LANDING CRAFT TYPE
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR ANY VESSEL DESIGNED TO LAND PERSONNEL, VEHICLES OR OTHER EQUIPMENT ASHORE WITHOUT THE NEED FOR FIXED BERTHING FACILITIES.

Name: SURFACE VESSEL TYPE
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR ANY TYPE OF VESSEL DESIGNED TO OPERATE ON THE SURFACE OF THE WATER.

Name: PLEASURE CRAFT TYPE
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR ANY CRAFT DESIGNED OR USED PRIMARILY FOR RECREATIONAL ACTIVITY.

Name: FISHING VESSEL TYPE
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR ANY VESSEL DESIGNED OR USED PRIMARILY FOR THE COMMERCIAL CATCHING, PROCESSING OR TRANSPORTING OF FISH OR FISH PRODUCTS.

Name: MERCHANT VESSEL TYPE
Explanation: A DESIGNATOR FOR ANY VESSEL DESIGNED OR USED PRIMARILY FOR COMMERCIAL OR SCIENCE/RESEARCH ACTIVITY.

Name: SHIP TARGET TYPE
Explanation: A SHIP TARGET TYPE DESCRIBED BY THE BASIC DESIGN, CONFIGURATION OR PRIMARY FUNCTION FOR WHICH IT WAS DESIGNED AND CONSTRUCTED OR CONVERTED.

Name: CONTACT VESSEL TYPE
Explanation: THE TYPE DESIGNATION OF THE CONTACT VESSEL, E.G "TMP" OR "CVN".
